title: Lockable Component Schema
description: Defines the state for an entity that can be locked or unlocked, potentially requiring a key.

isLocked.description: Indicates whether the entity is currently locked (true) or unlocked (false).

keyId.description: Optional. The namespaced ID of the specific key item required to unlock this entity. If null or omitted, it might be unlockable by other means (e.g., lockpicks, force) or doesn't require a specific key.
